description: Complete analytics map for the home screen across all tabs - includes home landing, regular bus, chalo bus (premium), profile, and tickets/history tabs.

position.description: Position index of the card or item in the list

title.description: Display title of the card, item, or menu option

desc list.description: List of description strings for the card/hook

tag list.description: List of tags associated with the card/hook
